mapper.insert: insert into shopReview(shop_member_id, shopReview_id, shopReview_star, shopReview_content, shopReview_date, item_idx) values(#{shop_member_id}, #{shopReview_id}, #{shopReview_star}, #{shopReview_content}, now(), #{item_idx})
mapper.select: select * from shopReview where shop_member_id=#{shop_member_id} order by shopReview_date desc;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM shopReview WHERE shop_member_id = #{shop_member_id}
SELECT * FROM shopReview WHERE shop_member_id = #{shop_member_id} ORDER BY shopReview_date ASC LIMIT 2
select * from shopReview where shopReview_id=#{shopReview_id} and item_idx=#{item_idx}
